channel.title: DoubleDutch Developer Platform
channel.description: Information for building on the DoubleDutch platform

item.title: Getting Started with DDDP
item.description: See this FAQ for non-engineers . The DoubleDutch Developer Platform supports developing standalone extensions that can be hosted within a DoubleDutch mobile app. Extensions are written in Javascript using the React Native framework. Developer videos…

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: What is the DoubleDutch Developer Platform (DDDP)? DDDP allows DoubleDutch customers and 3rd party developers to build extensions that can be installed to any DoubleDutch event app. What is an extension? An extension is a self-contained experience…

item.title: Web View Sections in a DoubleDutch event app
item.description: Getting started A web view can be embedded in any DoubleDutch event app via the DoubleDutch CMS. Layout > Add New Section > Web View Insert the URL of the web page to load. HTTPS is preferred. It can be an existing web page such as a Twitter feed…
